segments.text: How many foreign languages can you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of your English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have passed CET - 6 and I am proficient in reading and translating foreign materials . I have rich translating experience because I used to be an English translator .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have received an oral English training and I can communicate with others fluently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you take TOEFL or GRE ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . I got 600 in TOEFL and 2 , 300 in GRE .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you begin to learn English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I started to learn English when I was in primary school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think your English is good enough to do office work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The amount of English I know enables me to do general desk work . I believe the amount of English I know is sufficient to work in a South Korea firm .
segments.speaker: S2
